name: Please, Don't Touch Anything 3D
description: Now with Vive Support! A cryptic, brain-racking, button-pushing non-linear puzzle game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: SM3 512MB VRAM Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: SM4 1GB VRAM Storage: 500 MB available space
